de.mpg.biochem.mars.image.commands

Class GradientCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.scijava.module.AbstractModule
      • org.scijava.module.DefaultMutableModule
        • org.scijava.command.DynamicCommand
          • de.mpg.biochem.mars.image.commands.GradientCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, org.scijava.Cancelable, org.scijava.command.Command, org.scijava.Contextual, org.scijava.module.Module, org.scijava.module.MutableModule, org.scijava.plugin.SciJavaPlugin

    public class GradientCommand
extends org.scijava.command.DynamicCommand
implements org.scijava.command.Command
    This is a convenience command that calculates the gradient of an image. Assumes Z = 0. Processes all TIME and CHANNEL positions.
    Author:
    Karl Duderstadt
